reviews.review: топ

[h1] Вечная классика! [/h1]
Легендарная игра, которая стала началом всех игр Valve: Counter-Strike, Team Fortress, Portal, а так же, легендарной франшизы Half-Life. Сюжет неоднозначный: история учёного Гордона Фримэна, которому поручили провести эксперимент в комплексе Black Mesa, но что-то пошло не так... Сюжет одновременно хорош и плох. Хорош в том, что очень много неожиданных сюжетных поворотов, а плох - потому что ОЧЕНЬ МНОГО НЕНУЖНОГО!!! Зачем было делать 19 ГЛАВ, если 2/3 сюжета можно легко убрать и от этого хуже не станет! Игра будет всё той же прекрасной и не урезанной! Очень много непонятных глав, где ты ломаешь себе голову и порой у тебя это получается. Гордон [strike] Дмитрий[/strike] Фримэн стал легндой ПК игр, а ведь Half-Life выходила ещё и на PS2! Мультиплеер хорош. Его наличие скрашивает игру и добавляет разнообразие. Онлайн высокий и найти сервер 15-20 онлайна не составит проблем. Но берегитесь игроков с Гаузом (они зачастую скиловее вас раз в 100). Я люблю эту игру и рад что существуют такие ремейки этой игры, как Black Mesa. 8/10. Рекомендую!

Among classic fps games, and games in general, I find that I'm quite happy playing them on and off. I'll boot it up, have a good time, and then be done to take a break. Half Life is different. It's a game that almost demands a single sitting, as each level progresses to the next almost seamlessly, save for a very brief loading screen and one instance that marks the end of the first half of the game. Even after that, I kept on playing all the way up to the infamous Xen sections. Xen was admittedly not as painful as I thought it would be, though perhaps Doom Eternal made me accept that first person platforming could be fun. Regardless, this is an easy recommendation. If you can last the 7 minute train ride, you're in for a treat.

Pelistä löytyy myös multiplayer servereitä jos tarina muoto ei kiinnostele! Multiplayerservereiltä löytyy mitävaan Maan ja Taivaan välillä voi kuvitella esim. Pvp serverit HC pelaajille ja StoryModen nettiversio random pelleilyyn ja Venäläisten kanssa rupatteluun! Pelin arvosanaksi annan kertakaikkiaan 6/5 + Papukaijamerkki!

This was my very first 3d shooter game. I remember playing this as a 9 year old on my cousin's PC and I told myself this is the most realistic game I had ever seen. The most horrifying experience I ever had was encountering the alien possessed scientist for the first time and all I had was my pistol. It felt that I was actually holding my gun and I was fighting for my life. And I remember dying a couple of times.  Bear in mind, it was 1999 and the only games I was exposed to was Super Mario and Contra. 

After playing for the first time, I had dreams about this game. I thought about this game all the time during breakfast, school time, homework and at bed. I didn't have a computer like my cousin's so I told myself when I would grow up, I will get a job and buy myself a computer with Half Life and that's it, I will be settled for life. Again bear in mind, I was 9 at that time.

Fast forward, 20 years later, I download this and play it, and my impressions are this (and I am trying to be unbiased while having my nostalgia goggles off ), the graphics and gameplay mechanics are way too outdated, the shooting is mediocre and I can kill that alien scientist with my eyes closed. So if you got into gaming very late, played all the AC, Far Cry, GTA, all those  high budget AAA games and then playing this, and thinking "I don't get why this game is great", I get it, I feel the same way at times, its too outdated. Its amazing how the games have come so far, considering I once thought Half Life had the most "realistic graphics" ever.

So, would I recommend this game ? Hell, yes. 

Tbh, I'm just playing it for nostagia's sake, but as I play it, I can't help but feel some of the things this game did right that we don't see in today's games, the setting. the mood. the tone of the environment. Its just a mix of horror, anticipation,excitement, you have no idea whats going to happen in the next room, and it all happen in real time, in first person, in your perspective. No cutscenes, no in game movies. You don't see that many games do that today, and that is what makes me appreciate Half Life.
This game will still be forever in my heart as one of the best games ever made.
My cousin is no more. R.I.P. Thank you for introducing me to such a game and making my childhood bright, whether you intended it or not.

the gameplay is engaging and rewarding when pulled off correctly, the level design is solid (bar on a rail and the entirety of xen) and the graphics have aged like shit but still have charm to them. the biggest part of this game has to be the way it handles storytelling. being in control of gordon while other characters relay info to you makes the game feel that much more immersive. a solid 8.5/10 experience that everyone should try at least once.

This game is a landmark in the FPS genre. It completely revolutionized the linear narrative that many games are known for today. While it's fantastic it has not aged very well at all. The engine is janky and the final level xen completely kills all of the momentum of the story with long tedious platforming and frustrating encounters. 9.5/10

Un classico e un capolavoro della storia del videogioco, che mi sono finalmente deciso a recuperare. Non sapevo davvero cosa aspettarmi da questo titolo, e devo dire che la componente rompicapo mi ha davvero sorpreso e soddisfatto, collocandosi a pari livello con quella sparatutto. Poi l'atmosfera, la qualità in sé del prodotto, tutto davvero bello, e soprattutto assolutamente godibile ancora oggi. Non fatevi scoraggiare dalla data di uscita, il gioco è ancora dinamico, e azzardo dire che, se uscisse oggi, lo preferirei a tanti altri fps.
Piccole note di demerito: sono troppo abituato ad avere le granate su un tasto apposito che mi permetta di lanciarle senza doverle prima selezionare, avrei preferito questa scelta; alcune scale sono stranamente difficili da scendere, devi avvicinarti verso l'esterno piano piano e provare a vedere se Gordon inizia a scendere o no, e se sbagli di poco rischi di fare un bel volo.
Per il resto gran bel gioco!
best game ever but i get stuck on some parts
The gameplay, story, and soundtrack were fantastic and overall it still holds up despite being made in 1998. While a few chapters were a bit frustrating I still had a fun experience.
A classic of immersion, and visual storytelling. There isn't much I can say that hasn't been said already. The only advice I can give you is to save and load often in the later half of the game.

Después de rejugar el primer Half-Life y borrar mi anterior reseña, puedo decir que a pesar de no ser una obra maestra como todo el mundo dice, es una muy buena experiencia que vale la pena jugar al menos una vez.
Eso si, in-game entrad en la consola del juego y poned este comando "Default_fov 135" (sin las comillas) porque la versión de steam tiene el fov DEMASIADO BAJO, y varios errores que no tenía la versión "Won" del juego, pero tampoco son tan molestos como los del remake de source.
En resumen, que juguéis Half-life y no Half-Life source.
